lines.name: Replica Shroud of the Lightless
lines.flavourText:
"Eyes of black, three by three, staring ever darker into me..."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Svalinn

explicitModifiers.text: -10% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
-10% to maximum Chance to Block Spell Damage
Trigger a Socketed Elemental Spell on Block, with a 0.25 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
The priests found the Great Shield the night it fell to Middengard,
but it was the smiths who delved into the secrets it held.

lines.name: The Apostate

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Maximum Life instead of Maximum Energy Shield from Equipped Armour Items

lines.flavourText:
When I finally rejected my faith entirely, my stagnant belief
became thick white blood, as choking as it was nourishing.

lines.name: The Immortal Will

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Greater Harbinger of Focus Skill

<<HBGAa>><<HBG00>><<HBGAt>>

lines.name: Aegis Aurora

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
(10-20)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

lines.name: Ralakesh's Impatience

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges
Count as having maximum number of Power Charges
Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
The Master of a Million Faces lived by one
simple ethos: why make the effort, when
you can simply mimic what others have?

lines.name: Replica Farrul's Fur

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Cat has no Reservation
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Endurance Charges when you gain Cat's Agility
You have Onslaught while you have Cat's Agility

lines.flavourText:
"Attempt #120: the prototype has finally achieved power similar to the original
without breaking all the bones of the test subject. A rousing success."

lines.name: Farrul's Fur

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Cat has no Reservation
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Power Charges when you gain Cat's Stealth
You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

lines.name: Crown of the Tyrant

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies have -10% to all Resistances
You and Nearby Allies have 64 to 96 added Fire Damage per Red Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 56 to 88 added Cold Damage per Green Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 16 to 144 added Lightning Damage per Blue Socket
You and Nearby Allies have 47 to 61 added Chaos Damage per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
You will know if your subjects follow you from fear
or respect when you have your first moment of weakness.
If it's the former, they will tear you into pieces like rabid dogs.

lines.name: Death's Door

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Elemental Ailment Duration on you
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you

lines.flavourText:
To extend your life as long as possible
is to extend all the maladies that come with it.

lines.name: Crest of Desire
lines.flavourText: Expand one single ambition to crystal clarity... and beyond.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Skin of the Loyal
Bubonic Trail

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
(40-60)% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on You while affected by a Rare Abyss Jewel
(24-32)% increased Movement Speed while affected by a Magic Abyss Jewel
(16-24)% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills while affected by a Unique Abyss Jewel

lines.flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

lines.name: Emperor's Vigilance

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text:
Damage taken from Blocked Hits cannot bypass Energy Shield
Damage taken from Unblocked hits always bypasses Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Chitus' success stemmed from his cunning, taking calculated
risks so that greater dangers could be averted.

lines.name: Doryani's Prototype

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Armour also applies to Lightning Damage taken from Hits
Lightning Resistance does not affect Lightning Damage taken
Nearby Enemies have Lightning Resistance equal to yours

lines.flavourText:
"This was the first step in some grand design, 
lost to the ages, now ours to decipher." 
- Dominus, High Templar

lines.name: Cadigan's Crown
lines.flavourText:
Cadigan the Third ruled dispassionately
through the iron might of artifice.

lines.name: Annihilation's Approach

explicitModifiers.text: Take 6000 Fire Damage per Second while Flame-Touched
Gain Adrenaline when you become Flame-Touched
Lose Adrenaline when you cease to be Flame-Touched

lines.flavourText:
Pray that the flames find fascination,
for the true end follows when the great eye closes.

lines.name: Replica Alberon's Warpath

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 80 Chaos Damage to Attacks per 80 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Starving test subject became completely incapable of exerting force.
However, after being fed, he began to poison everything he touched..."

lines.name: The Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance

lines.flavourText:
We share one space,
speak one voice,
act through one body.
A flawless crystal.
Brittle.

lines.name: Atziri's Reflection
lines.flavourText:
"At last, my beauty is beyond reproach."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Cowl of the Cryophile

explicitModifiers.text: Can have a second Enchantment Modifier

lines.flavourText:
The villagers seared the blight with cold, but it only bloomed countless spears.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Echoes of Creation

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Warcry Skills have +1 Cooldown Use

When you Attack, take (15-20)% of Life as Physical Damage for
each Warcry Exerting the Attack
Skills deal (10-15)% more Damage for each Warcry Exerting them

lines.flavourText:
A cacophony of battle cries
Reverberate through time and space
Inflicting pain beyond measure

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: The Surrender
lines.flavourText:
Our hearts cry out
but are silenced by our flesh
and so we give up our flesh.

lines.name: Broken Faith

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
100% increased Global Armour while you have no Energy Shield
You have Unholy Might while you have no Energy Shield
Create Profane Ground instead of Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: Be not blinded by the light.

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
"The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, 
our land, and we will not let our gifts
be destroyed by savages."
- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: Strength provides no bonus to Maximum Life
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (2-4) to (5-9) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to (4-12) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText:
The night of a thousand ribbons
To remember the day of a thousand flames
When Sarn burned
And was born again

lines.name: Wraithlord

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of all Minion Skill Gems
+1 to maximum number of Raised Spectres per Socketed Ghastly Eye Jewel

lines.flavourText:
Countless men proclaimed themselves the masters of death,
and each one succumbed to it.

lines.name: Sporeguard

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Contaminate when you Kill an Enemy
Enemies on Fungal Ground you Kill Explode, dealing 10% of their Life as Chaos Damage
You have Fungal Ground around you while stationary

lines.name: Replica Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Skills have 20% chance to Ignite

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #73 is a near perfect opposite of the original. Perhaps our failures
are due to some unknown polarity we have yet to discover."

lines.name: Replica Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText:
"Useless for our purposes, but perhaps we can sell Prototype #5
to an archmage to fund other experiments."

lines.name: Replica Red Trail

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge on Hit while Poisoned
50% chance for Spell Hits against you to inflict Poison

lines.flavourText:
"Researchers will please refrain from combining our prototypes with existing relics
of power. The temptation is obvious, but the results can be... unpredictable." 
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Gravebind

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies Killed by anyone count as being Killed by you instead

lines.flavourText:
Try as you like to hide the
blood on your hands.
You'll still know the truth.

You gain Divinity for 10 seconds on reaching maximum Divine Charges

lines.flavourText:
Exceptional men and women of strong will can flicker a spark, 
but something much greater is needed to unleash the wildfire of true divine flames.

lines.name: The Iron Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per 50 Strength
Chance to Block Spell Damage is Unlucky

Strength's Damage Bonus instead grants 3% increased Melee
Physical Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
The Council cannot afford to falter."
- Mauritius, the Iron Heart

lines.name: Indigon

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (8-10)% of Life when you use a Mana Flask
Non-instant Mana Recovery from Flasks is also Recovered as Life
(50-60)% increased Cost of Skills for each 200 total Mana Spent Recently
(20-25)% increased Spell Damage for each 200 total Mana you have Spent Recently, up to 2000%

lines.flavourText:
Where the body's limits begin,
the mind's limits end.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
Regenerate 75 Life per second per Endurance Charge
(100-200)% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText:
Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Esh's Visage

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life
Reflect Shocks applied to you to all Nearby Enemies

lines.name: Asenath's Mark

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with a Bow, with a 0.3 second Cooldown

lines.flavourText:
Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance
lines.flavourText:
When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Heretic's Veil

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 22 Blasphemy
Socketed Curse Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText:
Branded a heretic for your beliefs,
You stand alone against many.
May the truth that fuels their anger,
Carry your blade into their hearts.

lines.name: Rathpith Globe

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you

explicitModifiers.text: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life

lines.flavourText:
The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

implicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Vaal Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Light of Lunaris

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (35-39) to (54-60) Cold Damage to Spells
+1% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+25% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've dealt a Non-Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText: Without night, there can be no day.

lines.name: The Formless Inferno

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Infernal Legion
Minion Life is increased by their Overcapped Fire Resistance

lines.flavourText: He burns us to keep us from harm.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Buff affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText:
Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.
Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.
Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.
By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Volkuur's Guidance

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-3) to (42-47) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
Lightning Skills have 20% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText:
You do not cease to be when you die
any more than the caterpillar ceases to be when it cocoons.
Come, let me show you.

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.name: Mistwall

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-15)% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits while Phasing
You are at Maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have not Blocked Recently
You have Phasing if you have Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
Light as a board,
Stiff as a feather.

lines.name: Abhorrent Interrogation

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% chance to inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit

Enemies take 4% increased Elemental Damage from your Hits for
each Withered you have inflicted on them
Your Hits cannot Penetrate or ignore Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"We have methods of interrogation the Inquisitors only dream of."
- Marcus, Brotherhood Liaison

lines.name: Replica Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Overcapped Cold Resistance

lines.flavourText:
"This is what I've been trying to tell you. This prototype
was different before. Now, it's always been this way!"
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Expedition's End

explicitModifiers.text: Freeze Chilled Enemies as though dealing (50-100)% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
He may have returned from the frozen southern reaches,
but that doesn't mean he ever truly escaped them.

lines.name: Viridi's Veil

explicitModifiers.text: Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you have a Magic Ring Equipped
You are Hexproof if you have a Magic Ring in right slot
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you have a Magic Ring in left slot

lines.flavourText:
"Her sisters eternally fought for that shining apex in the skies,
but Viridi instead found strength in humility."
- Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Doppelgänger Guise

explicitModifiers.text: (40-60)% more Critical Strike Chance while Insane
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed while Insane
(30-40)% less Physical and Chaos Damage Taken while Sane
Regenerate 10% Life over one second when Hit while Sane

lines.flavourText:
Within each of us exists a being of pure malice,
held back only by the lies we tell ourselves.

lines.name: Allelopathy
lines.flavourText:
"Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

lines.name: The Fourth Vow

explicitModifiers.text: Armour also applies to Chaos Damage taken from Hits
Physical Damage taken bypasses Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Seek not to avoid the mortal pains of this world.
In flagellation, there lies freedom from temptation.

lines.name: Replica Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Researcher Graven's request to wear Prototype #2998 in
place of his standard lab attire is... granted."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.flavourText:
"Hate? You speak to me of hate? You have no idea what your persecution inflicts.
How it chokes the heart. Withers the soul. Judge me, and you judge yourself."
- Saresh, last words, to Sekhema Orbala

lines.name: Seven Teachings

lines.flavourText:
Those devoted to the Dreamer pursue
perfection of the body and the will.

lines.name: Azadi Crest

explicitModifiers.text:
Your Lucky or Unlucky effects use the best or
worst from three rolls instead of two

lines.flavourText:
"Keita expects an assassination attempt by stealth or subterfuge.
I say we attack head-on, like madmen. Let the fates decide."
- Azadi, first ancestor of the House Azadin

lines.flavourText:
It is a fool who strikes the turtle's shell.
The First of the Plains teaches us to exploit weaknesses,
and where no weakness can be found, to create one.

lines.flavourText: The spirit hungers for the flesh.

lines.name: Skyforth

Stun Threshold is based on 500% of your Mana instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
The quick die young, the brilliant go mad,
and the powerful stand alone in a wasteland of their own creation.

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience

lines.flavourText:
He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Invictus Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Fire Aegis when Equipped

lines.flavourText:
Eternal soldiers fight for glory or death.
The Solaris Vanguard know only glory.

lines.name: Medved's Challenge

explicitModifiers.text: 80% less Flask Charges gained from Kills
Flasks gain 1 Charge per second if you've Hit a Unique Enemy Recently

lines.flavourText:
For forty-two nights, the Feller of Heroes challenged
the next greatest warrior to a one-on-one duel.
None could match his might.

lines.flavourText:
You do not cease to be when you die
any more than the caterpillar ceases to be when it cocoons.
Come, let me show you.

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Replica Soul Strike

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Physical Damage to Attacks

40% increased Maximum total Life Recovery per second from Leech

lines.flavourText:
"The theft of another's vitality is short-lived, but sweet.
It calls to me, bidding me abandon all other pursuits."
- Researcher Arn

Socketed Projectile Spells fire Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText:
He reached for his home one last time, a shining jewel among the stars...
only to watch in horror as it ruptured and shattered under a tide of limbs.

lines.name: The Fourth Vow

Physical Damage taken bypasses Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Seek not to avoid the mortal pains of this world.
In flagellation, there lies freedom from temptation.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

40% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced Chaos Damage taken over time
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems

lines.flavourText:
Tukohama couldn't lose a fight in his fortress,
So he carried his fortress to the fight.

lines.name: Replica Veil of the Night

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #722 might look like a helmet, but I believe it to be something else
entirely. The visions it shows the wearer... are beyond mortal endurance..."

lines.name: The Admiral

explicitModifiers.text: (10-25)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Elemental Damage you Deal with Hits is Resisted by lowest Elemental Resistance instead

lines.flavourText:
The Oriathans built their empire on naval mobility, which allowed
them to wage war wherever their enemy was weakest.

lines.name: Temptation Step

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Damage for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 75%
10% increased Movement Speed for each Poison on you up to a maximum of 50%

Poison you inflict with Travel Skills is Reflected to you if you
have fewer than 5 Poisons on you

lines.flavourText:
The High Priests ensured the loyalty of their slaves by habituating
them to narcotic stimulants with lethal withdrawals.

lines.name: The Trickster's Smile

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 100 Cold Damage to Melee Attackers
Reflects 100 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
Reflects 100 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
When an Enemy Hit deals Elemental Damage to you, their Resistance to those Elements becomes zero for 4 seconds

lines.flavourText:
The Raven Trickster made no move to defend himself.
He merely grinned... and the foolish warrior charged.

lines.name: Kaom's Heart

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
The warrior who
fears will fall.

lines.name: Fenumus' Toxins

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (16-21) to (31-36) Chaos Damage to Spells
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on hitting an Enemy affected by a Spider's Web
(6-10)% chance to Poison per Power Charge
(15-20)% increased Damage with Poison per Power Charge
Aspect of the Spider inflicts Spider's Webs and Hinder every 0.5 Seconds instead

lines.flavourText:
A hunter uses everything at their disposal.
The First of the Night did not hold back her venom. 
She used it to weaken her enemies, 
and used her enemies to strengthen her many children.

lines.name: Command of the Pit

explicitModifiers.text: With a Ghastly Eye Jewel Socketed, Minions have +1000 to Accuracy Rating
With a Hypnotic Eye Jewel Socketed, gain Arcane Surge on Hit with Spells

lines.flavourText: We serve only the Night.

lines.name: Hyrri's Ire

explicitModifiers.text: (105-145) to (160-200) Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Prism Guardian

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems Cost and Reserve Life instead of Mana
Socketed Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: When blood is paid, the weak think twice.

lines.name: Fenumus' Spinnerets

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Spider can inflict Spider's Web on Enemies an additional time
Gain (15-20) Energy Shield for each Enemy you Hit which is affected by a Spider's Web
(40-50)% increased Aspect of the Spider Debuff Duration

lines.flavourText:
When the fires spilled out of the mountain, The First of the Night wove a net
and was carried into the night on its hot winds.
Though we cannot live without danger, we can learn to live with it.

lines.name: Gruthkul's Pelt
lines.flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

lines.name: Replica Voidwalker

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Chain +1 times while you have Phasing

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject was able to walk into the walls of his chamber after breaking a rabbit's neck.
He was not fast enough, however. Suggest we begin excavation to retrieve prototype."

lines.name: Breathstealer

explicitModifiers.text: Create a Blighted Spore when your Skills or Minions Kill a Rare Monster

lines.flavourText:
The last gasp is not always one's final act.

<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

lines.name: Admiral's Arrogance

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance that if you would gain Rage on Hit, you instead gain up to your maximum Rage
+(1-3) to Level of all Melee Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The long and venerable lineages of the Oriathan nobility tended
to produce Admirals with, shall we say... quick tempers."

lines.name: Atziri's Step
lines.flavourText:
"Those who dance are considered insane 
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Doryani's Fist

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (150-225) to (525-600) Lightning Damage to Unarmed Melee Hits
Adds (90-135) to (315-360) Lightning Damage to Spells while Unarmed
+(200-250) Energy Shield gained on Killing a Shocked Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Doryani's ingenuity raised the Vaal Empire
to unprecedented heights. His curiosity
reduced it to ruins and bones.

lines.name: March of the Legion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(3-5) to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Divine Blessing

lines.flavourText: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.

lines.name: Replica Inya's Epiphany

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate 0.5% of Life per second per Power Charge
5% increased Movement Speed per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #56 was deemed safe, but judging by Administrator Qotra's new hustle
and improved ability to micromanage us, I'm not so sure." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Replica Abyssus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 75 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 30 to 65 Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 10 to 130 Lightning Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"While Prototype #3 does imbue its wearer with strength to match the original,
the first researcher to don it burst into flames when he walked into sunlight..."

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: The Scales of Justice

explicitModifiers.text: (3-4) to (7-8) added Fire Damage per 100 of Maximum Life or Maximum Mana, whichever is lower
Unaffected by Ignite or Shock if Maximum Life and Maximum Mana are within 500

lines.flavourText:
You shall be weighed and measured. You shall be judged...
and perhaps you shall be found worthy.

lines.flavourText:
Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

Immune to Elemental Ailments while affected by Glorious Madness
+15 to maximum Fortification while affected by Glorious Madness

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads as quickly as an idea.

lines.name: Maloney's Mechanism

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks

lines.name: Replica Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"Better... stronger... more vital... and then... failure. Always, failure.
What key fundamental secret are we missing?"

lines.name: Corpsewalker

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 20 Corpse Walk when Equipped
For each nearby corpse, Regenerate 8 Life per second
For each nearby corpse, 1% increased Movement Speed

lines.flavourText:
Every glorious conquest
stands astride innocent bones.

lines.name: Lioneye's Remorse

explicitModifiers.text: -25 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Marceus' unblemished shield is a testament
to his arrogance... and his fate.

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Chaos Damage
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 100% of Base Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
My Soul is your Strength
My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Replica Allelopathy

explicitModifiers.text: Wintertide Brand has (20-30)% increased Chill Effect

lines.flavourText:
"There seems to be some innate relationship between the forces of
chaos and cold. Perhaps we should consult an occultist."

lines.name: Shavronne's Wrappings

explicitModifiers.text: 10% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
Reflects 1 to 250 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks always inflict Bleeding while you have Cat's Stealth

You have Crimson Dance while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
A hungry beast wastes no energy. 
Every strike, no matter how small, must work towards victory.
The First of the Plains teaches us 
that the largest prey can still be whittled away.

lines.name: Loreweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-10) to (14-36) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

lines.name: Flamesight
lines.flavourText: See creation as it was, aflame and frantic.

lines.flavourText: The Azmeri must never touch the Tears of Maji, lest Viridi weep.

lines.name: Replica Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 29 Added Cold Damage
Skills gain a Base Energy Shield Cost equal to 200% of Base Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
"Researcher Graven's request to wear Prototype #2998 in
place of his standard lab attire is... granted."
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

lines.name: Devoto's Devotion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Swift as thought are the actions of Man 
when borne on wings of divine providence.

lines.name: Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

lines.name: Rime Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Concentrated Effect
+50% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier

lines.flavourText: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Enacting a grand vision requires cold-hearted sacrifice.
The loyal must be no more than fodder against the unwilling.

lines.name: The Hand of Phrecia

lines.flavourText:
To drive back the darkness, to bring peace,
we must fight side by side as brothers.

lines.name: The Ivory Tower

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +30 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

lines.name: Mutewind Pennant

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Onslaught for 4 seconds when you Warcry

lines.flavourText: Embrace the snow or be buried.

lines.name: Abberath's Hooves

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 7 Abberath's Fury when Equipped
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King knew not of war,
of the lands and laws he trampled.
The Goat King knew only joy
at turning life to ash.

Lose 2% of Life per second if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #7 achieved even greater injury responsiveness than expected,
though at considerable cost to the long-term survival rate of the user."

16% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject walked right through the poison gas defenses, and attempts to slow her
failed. Suppression troop six, the 'Furious Flagellants,' have been sent to intervene."

lines.flavourText:
The Wildwood was a gift, meant as a haven
against the Winter of the World.

lines.flavourText:
Eaten away by anxiety and fear,
nothing remained but the void.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Abyssus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 40 to 60 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
When you have slain all of your enemies,
what is left to fear?

lines.flavourText:
"A queen should be seen, admired, but never touched."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Aurseize
lines.flavourText: Wealth is not to be borne lightly.

Though we live and act as individuals,
